name: MINE 64 (WIP)
description:
⚠️ UNFINISHED

Started making this game 48h ago, due to time limits I'm currently uploading an unfinished version of the game. I'm going to update it ASAP!

Controls:
  • Z - Jump
  • X - Interact
  • Arrows - Movement

WIP Game Loop: Mine some blocks then go back to the top using "ESC + X".
